articles.title: Google says attackers used 100,000+ prompts to try to clone AI chatbot Gemini - NBC News
articles.description: Google says its flagship AI chatbot, Gemini, has been inundated by “commercially motivated” actors who are trying to clone the chatbot.

articles.title: Apple fixes zero-day flaw used in 'extremely sophisticated' attacks - BleepingComputer
articles.description: Apple has released security updates to fix a zero-day vulnerability that was exploited in an "extremely sophisticated attack" targeting specific individuals.

articles.title: Highguard’s developer reportedly lays off ‘most’ of its staff just over two weeks after launch - The Verge
articles.description: Highguard developer Wildlight Entertainment has laid off “most of the team,” according to a former staffer on LinkedIn. Highguard launched in late January.

articles.title: Blizzard Is Bringing The Warlock Class To Diablo IV: Lord Of Hatred, Diablo II, And Diablo Immortal - Game Informer
articles.description: You can play as the Warlock in Diablo II starting today as part of the new Reign of the Warlock DLC.

articles.title: Apple’s Siri revamp reportedly delayed… again - TechCrunch
articles.description: While the new Siri was expected to launch with the upcoming iOS 26.4 update in March, now, the changes are expected to roll out more slowly over time, reportedly postponing some features until the May iOS update, or even until the release of iOS 27 in Septemb…

articles.title: Rules of mysterious ancient board game decoded by AI, scientists say - CBS News
articles.description: The aim of the "deceptively simple but thrilling strategy game" was to hunt and trap the opponent's pieces in as few moves as possible, scientists said.

articles.title: Microsoft says hackers are exploiting critical zero-day bugs to target Windows and Office users - TechCrunch
articles.description: Critical security flaws targeting Windows and Office users allow hackers to take complete control of a victim's computer by clicking a malicious link or opening a file. Patch now.

articles.description: Tarsier, the studio behind the Little Nightmares series, is back with horror game Reanimal, which launches on February 13th on the PS5, Xbox, PC, and Switch 2.

articles.title: After cutting half of 2XKO's team less than 30 days from launch, I have to ask: how can any of us get behind a new Riot game ever again? - Eurogamer
articles.description: Riot Games is cutting roughly half the development roles on the 2XKO team, the latest in a string of fumbles by the company.
